entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
